name: Noweb License
licenseText:

<project> is protected by copyright. It is not public-domain software or shareware, and it is not protected by a ``copyleft'' agreement like the one used by the Free Software Foundation.

<project> is available free for any use in any field of endeavor. You may redistribute <project> in whole or in part provided you acknowledge its source and include this COPYRIGHT file. You may modify <project> and create derived works, provided you retain this copyright notice, but the result may not be called <project> without my written consent.

You may sell <project> if you wish. For example, you may sell a CD-ROM including <project>.

You may sell a derived work, provided that all source code for your derived work is available, at no additional charge, to anyone who buys your derived work in any form. You must give permisson for said source code to be used and modified under the terms of this license. You must state clearly that your work uses or is based on <project> and that <project> is available free of change. You must also request that bug reports on your work be reported to you.
